name: mandiant-feed
label: Mandiant Feed
description:
Mandiant Threat Intelligence provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs) â€” IP addresses, domain names, URLs threat actors are using, via the indicators.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Public Key
fields.name: public_key
fields.description: The unique Mandiant Threat Intelligence Public Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intelligence API.

fields.title: Private Key
fields.name: private_key
fields.description: Unique Private Key of the Mandiant Threat Intel that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intel API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves all indicators or specific indicators from Mandiant Feed based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Indicators

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the indicators retrieved from Mandiant Feed to only include only those items that have been created after the specified Datetime.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results that you want this operation to return, per page, in the response. The maximum number of results per page is set to 50 items.

parameters.title: STIX UUID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to filter the indicators retrieved from Mandiant Feed

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Select the status of the indicator based on which you want to filter the indicators retrieved from Mandiant Feed. You can choose between Active or Revoked.
